name: macOS Big Sur Icons
description:
A collection of Big Sur icons I've rolled or customized for macOS. Feel free to copy and remix these for your own use.


Export Instructions

For optimal P3 color support I recommend installing the Export PNG with Color Profile plugin. The artboards all come ready for export. Simply name the zip file <icon-name>.iconset.zip on save (e.g. "Spotify.iconset.zip") and then double-click the ZIP file to ready your .iconset folder.


Once that has been done, you can run this script from Terminal (substituting the name of your .iconset folder:


iconutil -c icns ~/Desktop/"$@".iconset


You can also add this utility function to your .bashrc or .zshrc to automate this (make sure your ZIPs are saved to your Desktop):


# Generate ICNS
function icon() {
 iconutil -c icns ~/Desktop/"$@".iconset
}
